title: Sony Says Diverse Capital Sources Key for Asset Acquisition
description: Sony Group Corp.’s strategy of tapping on private equity and different funding sources beyond traditional bank debt and stock is crucial for its acquisitions, Chief Executive Officer Hiroki Totoki said.
